name: MiniDev Marketplace
description: MiniMart Marketplace - Decentralized commerce on Minima blockchain with official MiniDapps

dapps.name: MiniMart v9
dapps.description: Latest version of the decentralized marketplace with advanced trading features
dapps.about: Full-featured decentralized marketplace with token trading, escrow services, and user profiles

dapps.name: MiniMart Blockchain Profiles
dapps.description: Enhanced marketplace with blockchain-based user profiles and reputation system
dapps.about: Marketplace featuring decentralized user profiles stored on-chain

dapps.name: MiniMart Decentralized IPFS
dapps.description: Marketplace with decentralized file storage using IPFS for product images and metadata
dapps.about: IPFS-integrated marketplace for truly decentralized commerce

dapps.name: MiniMart Manual Approval
dapps.description: Marketplace with manual seller approval system for quality control
dapps.about: Curated marketplace requiring manual approval for sellers

dapps.name: MiniMart Pending UI
dapps.description: Marketplace with enhanced pending transaction management interface
dapps.about: Improved user interface for managing pending transactions and orders

dapps.name: MiniMart Treasury Button
dapps.description: Marketplace with integrated treasury management features
dapps.about: Marketplace including treasury management and fund allocation tools

dapps.name: Block Explorer
dapps.description: Explore the Minima blockchain, view transactions and blocks
dapps.about: Official Minima Block Explorer - View blockchain data, transactions, and network statistics

dapps.name: FutureCash
dapps.description: Time-locked payments and future-dated transactions on Minima
dapps.about: Create time-locked payments and schedule future transactions on the Minima blockchain

dapps.name: Script IDE
dapps.description: Write and test KISSVM smart contracts
dapps.about: Integrated development environment for writing and testing Minima smart contracts using KISSVM

dapps.name: Storefront
dapps.about: Official Minima Storefront - Browse and install MiniDapps from various stores

dapps.name: Terminal
dapps.about: Terminal interface for direct command-line interaction with the Minima node

dapps.name: Wallet
dapps.description: Official Minima wallet for managing funds and tokens
dapps.about: Official Minima wallet - Send, receive, and manage Minima coins and custom tokens

dapps.name: IncentiveCash
dapps.about: Minima incentive program - Earn rewards by participating in the network
